declare @SQLScript nvarchar(max)

with src as (
select *
   FROM OPENJSON('@{replace(string(pipeline().parameters.p_src_objects), '''', '''''')}') 
   WITH (
    iteration integer '$.iteration',
    object NVARCHAR(max) '$.object',
    dbschema NVARCHAR(max) '$.schema',
    alias NVARCHAR(max) '$.alias',
    trgKeyCol NVARCHAR(max) '$.trgKeyCol',
    cdcCol NVARCHAR(max) '$.cdcCol',
    selectCols NVARCHAR(max) '$.selectCols',
    joinCondition NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinCondition',
    joinType NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinType',
    joinOrder integer '$.joinOrder')
),
kcl as (    select src.*, k.keyCols from src left outer join(select iteration, string_agg(coalesce(alias, object) + '_' + replace(replace(trgKeyCol, ' ', ''), ',', ', ' + coalesce(alias, object) + '_'), ', ') keyCols
   FROM OPENJSON('@{replace(string(pipeline().parameters.p_src_objects), '''', '''''')}') 
   WITH (
    iteration integer '$.iteration',
    object NVARCHAR(max) '$.object',
    dbschema NVARCHAR(max) '$.schema',
    alias NVARCHAR(max) '$.alias',
    trgKeyCol NVARCHAR(max) '$.trgKeyCol',
    cdcCol NVARCHAR(max) '$.cdcCol',
    selectCols NVARCHAR(max) '$.selectCols',
    joinCondition NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinCondition',
    joinType NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinType',
    joinOrder integer '$.joinOrder')
	where iteration = 0 group by iteration) k 
on 1 = 1),
rpl as (select kcl.*, r.replace_start, r.replace_end from kcl join
(select iteration, string_agg('replace(', '') replace_start, 
string_agg(', ''' + case when left(trim(object), 1) = '(' and right(trim(object), 1) = ')' 
then alias + '.' else object + '.' end + ''', ''' + coalesce(alias, object) + '.'')', '') replace_end
   FROM OPENJSON('@{replace(string(pipeline().parameters.p_src_objects), '''', '''''')}') 
   WITH (
    iteration integer '$.iteration',
    object NVARCHAR(max) '$.object',
    dbschema NVARCHAR(max) '$.schema',
    alias NVARCHAR(max) '$.alias',
    trgKeyCol NVARCHAR(max) '$.trgKeyCol',
    cdcCol NVARCHAR(max) '$.cdcCol',
    selectCols NVARCHAR(max) '$.selectCols',
    joinCondition NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinCondition',
    joinType NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinType',
    joinOrder integer '$.joinOrder')
	group by iteration) r
	on r.iteration = kcl.iteration)
select @SQLScript = STRING_AGG(cast(SQLScript as nvarchar(max)), ' union ') from (
select 'select ' + cast(rpl.iteration as varchar(10)) + ' as iteration, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.object, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as object, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.dbschema, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as dbschema, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.alias, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as alias, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.trgKeyCol, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as trgKeyCol, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.cdcCol, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as cdcCol, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.selectCols, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as selectCols, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.joinCondition, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as joinCondition, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.joinType, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as joinType, ' +
cast(rpl.joinOrder as varchar(10)) + ' as joinOrder, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.replace_start, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as replaceStart, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.replace_end, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as replaceEnd, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(rpl.keyCols, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', 'null') + ' as keyColsStatement, ' +
coalesce('''' + replace(CASE trim(rpl.selectCols)
				WHEN '*' THEN (select string_agg(cast('<obj>.' + c.name + ' as <obj>_' + c.name as nvarchar(max)), ', ') 
					from sys.columns c 
					join sys.views v on c.object_id = v.object_id
					join sys.schemas s on s.schema_id = v.schema_id
					where v.name = rpl.object and s.name = rpl.dbschema)
				ELSE (select string_agg(cast('<obj>.' + value + ' as <obj>_' + value as nvarchar(max)), ', ') 
					from string_split(replace(replace(rpl.selectCols, char(39), char(39) + char(39)), ' ', ''), ',')
					where lower(value) <> rpl.cdcCol) + coalesce(', ' + cast('<obj>.' + rpl.cdcCol + ' as <obj>_' + rpl.cdcCol as nvarchar(max)), '') END, '<obj>', coalesce(rpl.alias, rpl.object)) + '''', 'null') + ' as selectStatement, ' +
coalesce('''' + CASE WHEN left(trim(object), 1) = '(' and right(trim(object), 1) = ')' 
				THEN replace(replace(object, char(39), char(39) + char(39)), '<schema>', rpl.dbschema) + ' ' + alias
				ELSE replace(rpl.object, rpl.object, rpl.dbschema + '.' + rpl.object + ' as ' + coalesce(rpl.alias, rpl.object)) 
				END + '''', 'null') + ' as fromStatement, ' + 
coalesce('' + rpl.replace_start + char(39) + 
replace(CASE WHEN rpl.iteration = 0 THEN rpl.joinCondition ELSE replace(rpl.joinCondition, '<trgtab>', '_stg') END, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + char(39) + rpl.replace_end, 'null') + ' as joinStatement, ' + 
coalesce('''' + coalesce(alias, object) +'.' + rpl.cdcCol + ' > '''''' + ' + coalesce('cast(max(' + @{if(empty(pipeline().parameters.p_datetime_from), if(activity('GetTargetDeltaMetadata').output.exists, 'dbSys.colName', '''''''1900-01-01'''''''), concat('''', pipeline().parameters.p_datetime_from, ''''))} + ') as varchar(50)) ', '''1900-01-01''') + ' + ''''''''', 'null') + ' as whereStatement' +
case when dbSys.colName is null or @{if(activity('GetTargetDeltaMetadata').output.exists, '1=0', '1=1')} then '' else ' from @{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_schema}.@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_object}' end as SQLScript
from rpl
left outer join 
(select c.name as colName, v.name as viewName, s.name as schemaName
from sys.columns c
join sys.views v on c.object_id = v.object_id 
join sys.schemas s on v.schema_id = s.schema_id) dbSys 
on dbSys.ColName = coalesce(rpl.alias, rpl.object) + '_' + cdcCol
and dbSys.schemaName = '@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_schema}'
and dbSys.viewName = '@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_object}') q

exec('select * from (' + @SQLScript + ') q order by iteration, joinOrder')

declare @SQLScript nvarchar(max)

SELECT @SQLScript = STRING_AGG('select ' + cast(iteration as nvarchar(max)) + ' as iteration, ''' 
+ keyCols + ''' as keyCols, ' + sourceQuery + ' as sourceQuery, ' + pruningQuery + ' as pruningQuery', ' union ') FROM (
SELECT iteration, min(keyColsStatement) as keyCols, '''select '''
+ coalesce(' + ''@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_alias}.' + replace(replace(replace(min(case iteration when 0 then null else keyColsStatement end), ' ', ''), ',', ', @{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_alias}.'), char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + ', ''', '')
+ (' + ''' + replace(STRING_AGG(selectStatement, ', '), char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''')
+ coalesce(' + '', '' + ' + CASE WHEN iteration = 0 THEN min(replaceStart) + ''''
+ replace('@{replace(pipeline().parameters.c_partition_formula, '''', '''''')}', char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''' + min(replaceEnd) ELSE '''@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_alias}.@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_partition_col}''' END + ' + '' as @{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_partition_col}''', '')
+ @{if(empty(pipeline().parameters.c_trg_cdc_col), '', concat(''' + '''', cast(''''''''', variables('v_cdc'), ''''''''' as datetime2) as ', pipeline().parameters.c_trg_cdc_col, ''''''''))}
+ coalesce(' + '' from ' + CASE WHEN iteration = 0 THEN '' ELSE '@{concat(pipeline().parameters.c_trg_schema, '.', pipeline().parameters.c_trg_object, ' as ', pipeline().parameters.c_trg_alias)} ' END + replace(STRING_AGG(coalesce(coalesce(joinType + ' join ', '') + fromStatement, '')
+ coalesce(' on ' +  joinStatement, ''), ' '), char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', '')
+ coalesce(' + '' where (' + replace(STRING_AGG(whereStatement, ' or ') + CASE WHEN iteration = 0 THEN '' ELSE ' or @{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_alias}.@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_cdc_col} = ''@{variables('v_cdc')}''' END, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + ')''', '') as sourceQuery,
'''select distinct(''' + coalesce(' + ' + CASE WHEN iteration = 0 THEN min(replaceStart) + '''' + replace('@{replace(pipeline().parameters.c_partition_formula, '''', '''''')}', char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''' + min(replaceEnd) ELSE '''_stg._PARTITION''' END + ' + '') as _PARTITION''', '') 
+ coalesce(' + '' from ' + CASE WHEN iteration = 0 THEN '' ELSE '@{concat(pipeline().parameters.c_trg_schema, '.', pipeline().parameters.c_trg_object, ' as ', pipeline().parameters.c_trg_alias)} ' END + replace(STRING_AGG(coalesce(coalesce(joinType + ' join ', '') + fromStatement, '')
+ coalesce(' on ' +  joinStatement, ''), ' '), char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + '''', '')
+ coalesce(' + '' where (' + replace(STRING_AGG(whereStatement, ' or ') + CASE WHEN iteration = 0 THEN '' ELSE ' or @{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_alias}.@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_cdc_col} = ''@{variables('v_cdc')}''' END, char(39), char(39) + char(39)) + ')''', '') as pruningQuery
FROM OPENJSON('@{replace(string(activity('SourceQueryParts').output.resultSets[0].rows), '''', '''''')}')
WITH (
    iteration integer '$.iteration',
    object NVARCHAR(max) '$.object',
    alias NVARCHAR(max) '$.alias',
    trgKeyCol NVARCHAR(max) '$.trgKeyCol',
    cdcCol NVARCHAR(max) '$.cdcCol',
    selectCols NVARCHAR(max) '$.selectCols',
    joinCondition NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinCondition',
    joinType NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinType',
    joinOrder integer '$.joinOrder',
    replaceStart NVARCHAR(max) '$.replaceStart',
    replaceEnd NVARCHAR(max) '$.replaceEnd',
    keyColsStatement NVARCHAR(max) '$.keyColsStatement',
    selectStatement NVARCHAR(max) '$.selectStatement',
    fromStatement NVARCHAR(max) '$.fromStatement',
    joinStatement NVARCHAR(max) '$.joinStatement',
    whereStatement NVARCHAR(max) '$.whereStatement')
group by iteration
) q

exec(@SQLScript)

create or alter view @{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_schema}.@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_object} as
select * from OPENROWSET(
        BULK '@{activity('EnrichedLakeSettings').output.properties.typeProperties.url}@{if(endswith(activity('EnrichedLakeSettings').output.properties.typeProperties.url, '/'), '', '/')}@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_container}/@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_root_folder}/@{pipeline().parameters.c_trg_object}/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
